text: Thomas Clarkson (April 1865–1915) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Aston Villa. ==References== Category:1865 births Category:1915 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:English Football League players Category:Halesowen Town F.C. players Category:Aston Villa F.C. players
title: Thomas Clarkson (footballer)
